Get connected with nearby chess clubs through personalized recommendations! 

ClubSpot for Chrome offers real-time chess club suggestions based on your location— including both college chess clubs and Chess.com affiliated clubs.

How to use ClubSpot?

➤ Open the drop-down menu and select a nearby chess club in your area
➤ Auto-join the Chess.com club or share it with friends

➤ What’s next?

~ Version 2.0 will include live updates for nearby in-person and online chess events!
